programme.title: Ollie And Friends
programme.desc: The Triangle Aliens visit Ollie, Cherry and Sloppy for a fun sleepover. They bring along a special plant, with clear instructions not to water it. When Sloppy disregards their instructions, he lands all of them in a real tangle! Monster Cactus loves his new pet, Sheldon the snail. But when they have a day out on the beach, Monster Cactus realizes that Sheldon isn't the best at beach volleyball. He has to choose between sticking with his friend or losing the match.

programme.title: Creative Galaxy
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of Arty and his sidekick Epiphany, as they search the galaxy to solve creative problems with art!

programme.title: Little Tami's Book
programme.desc: A misguided idea of a hero leads to a series of mishaps. Will they be able to handle life without weight?

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Catch a brand new segment starring Cookie Monster in "Cookie Monster's Foodie Truck". And look out for special guest appearances by international Sesame Street characters Chamki (from Galli Galli Sim Sim), Lily (from Zhima Jie: Da Niao Kan Shijie) and Zuzu (from Takalani Sesame).

programme.title: Becca's Bunch
programme.desc: It's a rainy day and Russell is getting antsy being stuck inside. Becca, determined to make staying indoors fun, creates a magical story starring the Bunch and fellow Wagtailers, keeping them all entertained.

programme.title: Counting With Paula
programme.desc: Mr Guard gets Paula and her friends to help put together a surprise birthday party for Aamil. But Billy has trouble keeping the surprise a secret. Will he ruin it? Paula goes on an adventure by herself to help her friends in the jungle. However, she faces obstacles that are really hard to solve alone. Will she succeed or can she count on her friends when she needs them the most?

programme.desc: Animated series about a fairy and her adventures running a neighborhood cafe with her friends.

programme.title: Rev & Roll
programme.desc: Rev & Roll follows the adventures of eight-year-old Rev and his best friend Rumble - a rambunctious truck with all the personality of a loyal and enthusiastic dog!

programme.title: Royal India[a.k.a. Royal India with Samira]- EP 2
programme.desc: Samira returns to India, this time in search of culinary secrets from India's Royal families. She travels to fabulous palaces, meets Kings and Princesses, and cooks with Royal chefs to bring you their favourite dishes.

programme.title: Rachel Allen's Cake Diaries
programme.desc: Cake is about so much more than the traditional celebrations we all recognise. It shouldn't be confined to birthdays and anniversaries. A great cake has a part to play in everyday life. In this super-stylish yet personal series, chef Rachel Allen flicks through her diary where a range of life events, from a big family occasion to something as simple as a change in the weather, inspires a cake to compliment the moment.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Famous Foodies
programme.sub-title: Montecito, Gwyneth Paltrow, France, Superfoods, Celeb Cook Books
programme.desc: Famous Foodies tells you about what and where the celebrities eat, from healthy lifestyles to haute cuisine.

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: Michael receives a text from Peter asking to meet up. He's in two minds about it, what will his decision be? Meanwhile, Arjun is undecided on what his specialization should be until an incident at the hospital helps him to see things in a different light.

programme.title: David Rocco's Dolce South East Asia
programme.desc: After facing injustice and inequality, a small group of women came together to say enough is enough. Because of them, Malaysia is now taking the lead in muslim nations 'women's rights'. Over a few delicious meals, David meets a few inspiring female activists who share their experiences with sexism and discrimination, and what it is like to live as a Muslim woman in Malaysia.

programme.title: The Muscleteers
programme.desc: Follows four daring rodents - two mice, a rat and a hamster - who band together to help those in need and fight crime in the Harbor district!

programme.desc: Come along with Xavier Riddle, the most effusive pint-sized history adventurer; Yadina, his effervescent little sister; and his brilliant best friend Brad, as they unravel the secrets of world famous heroes from history!

programme.title: Lost In Oz
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Dorothy Gale and her trusty dog Toto search for Glinda the Good, in the hope that she can give them the magic they need to send them home to Kansas.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: When the boys get tired of taking orders from Dave, they decide to build a treehouse in the backyard and move out.

programme.title: Zero Hero
programme.desc: Zero Hero revolves around a superhero family who have mysteriously lost all their super powers and now struggle to be like the average human being.

programme.title: The Wall UK
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune
programme.desc: Hosted by Pat Sajak, this game show features 3 contestants who try to solve a puzzle by spinning the wheel and guessing letters in a word or phrase.

programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Anthony confronts Towkay Heng about the real reason he went to Jalan Besar as rumours of his alleged affair intensifies. Damien gets an interview with Sunny Straits University while Mandy steps up her job search.

programme.title: Chef Next Door
programme.desc: Chef Jonas shares the easiest and most practical ways to cook restaurant recipes, some tricks of the trade and chef hacks that he has learned over ten years of working inside a professional kitchen. Each episode teaches viewers how to come up with restaurant quality output from modern urban limitation. Be prepared to see how he bounces back from kitchen struggles like lack of time and budget.

programme.title: Crimewatch
programme.desc: Officers from the Criminal Investigation Department pick up the trail of a suspect after a misconstrued relationship resulted in the unfortunate death of a young woman. In this episode, we share some common scams that have surfaced recently, and how victims had fallen prey to such scams. We also share tips on how to safeguard yourself from such scams and protect your personal information.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Mata Mata
programme.desc: 1949, the Japanese Occupation is over, Singapore has returned to British control, but the people are still struggling to pick up the pieces of their lives. 19 year-old Elizabeth Lee (Cheryl Wee) has just finished her Senior Cambridge exams and her mother, Yoke Lien (Aileen Tan) gives her two choices: find a job or get married. However, Elizabeth's gets into a scuffle with gangsters, catching the attention of secret society member Lim Seng Hock (Daren Tan) and British officer Henry Ridley.

programme.title: New Amsterdam
programme.desc: Max races against the clock to rearrange the budget when faced with employees going unpaid, while Kapoor is presented with a device that's the future of medicine. Meanwhile, Iggy goes against the norms to prove a diagnosis and Bloom gets an unexpected visitor.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Vietnam
programme.desc: Continuing his journey in the bustling city of Hanoi, Luke is up bright-and-early to cook one of Vietnam's most famous dishes, pho bo (beef noodle soup with rice noodles). After perfecting this well known broth, he ventures to one of the outskirts of this amazing city to learn how rice paper is made, which he immediately applies to his spring roll recipe. In the greater parts of Hanoi, pork terrine and green rice are also on the menu.

programme.title: Sunny Side Up

programme.title: Hotspots: The Last Hope
programme.desc: Our planet is abundant with life. But in some places where there is an especially large variety of animal and plant species, there is also a high level of habitat destruction. These are areas that demand special protection: the Hotspots of biodiversity. In recent years, three species are driven to extinction every day. Scientists have found a solution: we must preserve the Hotspots.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings return for more hilarious misadventures! With their endless battles over the ranger's cabin which they do not want to share, Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. Amidst the debris, they discover a strange pack: an army tent with all the necessary equipment to recreate a "home" in nature. It's the chance to discover the joys of camping in the wild.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the ranger's heavy trunks, which he immediately clears out of the cabin, his enemies stuck to it like stickers. What he doesn't know, is that the trunk contains a multifunction drone, complete with joystick and virtual reality headset, which enables "embedded" piloting. Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.desc: Ollie, Cherry and Sloppy spy a figure on the moon. Worried that it's stranded and determined to help, they fly up to the moon, only to find a giant alien beast. Their attempts to help enrage it instead, and now the gang has an angry beast on their tail! They say if you send a lantern up into the sky, your wish will be granted. Sloppy has a lot of wishes, so he makes a giant lantern. Unfortunately, his lantern carries more than just his wishes up into the sky --- their entire house with it too!

programme.title: Winx Club - Eighth Series
programme.desc: While the Winx are trying to stop the attack on the Sun, the Specialists deal with the two dark giants that are about to attack Gardenia. Meanwhile, Obscurum goes to Lumenia to claim his throne. Valtor tries to take possession of Bloom's Cosmix, but he is rejected by the power itself and sent into the Limbo. The Winx, helped by the Specialists and Orion, save the Sun and Gardenia... But Valtor is ready to return, and frees the Trix from their space-time prison...

programme.title: Make It Count
programme.desc: Done in Amazing Race style, we pit Joakim against Charlotte in a quest around Singapore to find Maths in the nation's famous skyline. From buildings that draw inspiration from Nature's favourite shape to the structures that share the same ratios as our insides and the Maths behind the gravity-defying domes that is the Gardens by the Bay, this is a round-island tour with a difference. After this episode, you will never look at skyscrapers in Singapore the same again. Or Maths, for that matter.
